japanese: あれ、もう日が落ちて来ちゃった？
translation: Huh? Has the sun already set?

japanese:
１日早かったねー。
あっという間だった。
translation: The day sure went by in a flash, didn't it.

japanese:
まだまだ遊びたいですけど、
帰らないといけない時間ですね。
translation:
I want to keep playing,
but it's time to head back right?

japanese:
あ、待って！
ここから日が沈むのを見るのはどう？
そのくらいの時間ならあるんじゃない？
translation:
Oh, wait!
How about we watch the sunset from here?
We still have time for that, right?

japanese:
いいですね！
エメラルドビーチというところがありますから、
行ってみましょうか。
translation:
Sounds good!
There's a place called Emerald Beach,
let's go check it out.

japanese: 上杉さんも三玖も、いいですか？
translation: Uesugi-san, Miku, are you guys okay?

japanese: おう、いいぞ。
translation: Sure, yeah.

japanese: 私も見てみたい。
translation: I want to see the sunset too.

japanese: じゃあ、エメラルドビーチに向かって出発でーす！
translation: Alright, let's head to Emerald Beach together!

japanese:
（フータローとこうして並んで歩く……。
　こんなこともできなかったなんて、
　なんだか嘘みたい）
translation:
(Walking side by side with Futaro...
 I can hardly believe it.
 It almost feels like a dream.)

japanese: 三玖、疲れてないか？
translation: Miku, you tired?

japanese: ううん、大丈夫。
translation: No, I'm fine.

japanese:
先頭が四葉とらいはだからな。
あいつら、ほっとくとどんどん先に
行っちまいそうだし、歩くの早かったら言えよ。
translation:
After all, it's Yotsuba and Raiha who are walking ahead.
Those two'll go faster and faster if no one warns them.
Remember to tell me if you can't keep up.

japanese: ありがと。
translation: Thanks.

japanese: フータロー君、なかなかいい彼氏っぷりだね～。
translation: You're such a good boyfriend, Futaro-kun.

japanese: あっ……。
translation: Ah...

japanese: このくらい普通だろ。
translation: This kind of thing is usual.

japanese:
ええ、フー君は元々すごく優しいもの。
わかりにくいだけで。
translation:
Yeah, Fu-kun has always been really kind.
He's just hard to read sometimes.

japanese:
（二乃の言う通りだ。
　人の気持ちに寄り添ってくれるフータローの優しさ、
　私はよくわかってるはずだったのに）
translation:
(Nino's right. I thought I had understood
 Futaro's kindness when it comes to
 understanding people's feelings.)

japanese: （ごめんね、フータロー）
translation: (I'm sorry, Futaro.)

japanese:
一花も二乃も、
あまり２人の邪魔をしてはいけませんよ？
translation:
Ichika, Nino,
please don't interfere too much with them, okay?

japanese:
あら、そーね。
じゃあ２人はゆっくり歩いてきてちょうだい。
translation:
Ah, okay then.
Take your time walking back.

japanese: エメラルドビーチで待ってるよー。
translation: We'll be waiting at Emerald Beach.

japanese:
ったく、五月にまで
あんなこと言われちまうとはな。
translation:
Man, can't believe we're already getting scolded
even by Itsuki.

japanese: そうだね。
translation: Yeah.

japanese:
（こういう沈黙も嫌じゃない。
　フータローとなら……）
translation:
(I don't mind this kind of silence.
 If it's with Futaro...)

japanese: えっ……！
translation: Huh?!

japanese: （フータローが、手、握って……！）
translation: (Futaro's...holding...my...HAND!)

japanese: フ、フータロー？
translation: F-Futaro...?

japanese: （平気な顔してるけど……耳、真っ赤）
translation: (He looks unbothered...but his ears are bright red.)

japanese:
（だったら……
　私もちょっとだけ、握り返してみようかな？）
translation:
(If that's the case...
 Maybe I'll squeeze his hand back,
 just a little?)

japanese: 三玖……。
translation: Miku...

japanese:
（フータローの手、
　思ったよりも大きくて、
　包まれてるみたいで安心する）
translation:
(Futaro's hand is bigger than I thought,
 I feel a sense of relief when his hand wraps around mine.)

japanese:
（こうしてると、
　なんだか暖かい気持ちになって……）
translation: (Doing this makes me feel warm inside, somehow...)

japanese: （えっ？　な、なに！？）
translation: (Huh? Wh-what's this?!)

japanese: （これって……恋人繋ぎっていうの……だよね？）
translation: Are we...interlocking our fingers...right now?

japanese: ふ、フータロー？
translation: F-Futaro...?

japanese: どうかしたか？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese:
えっ！？
う、ううん、なんでもないけど……。
translation:
Huh?!
N-no, nothing...

japanese:
（そ、そうだよ。
　付き合ってるんだから、
　こういうことしてもおかしくなんてない）
translation:
(Th-that's right.
 We're dating, so it's not weird
 to do this kind of thing.)

japanese: （私が意識しすぎなんだ、きっと）
translation: (You're probably just overthinking things.)

japanese: ゆ、夕日が綺麗だな！
translation: T-the sunset looks beautiful, doesn't it?!

japanese: うん……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese: （フータローの手、さっきより熱くなってる……）
translation: (Futaro's hand, it feels warmer than before...)

japanese: あ、あのさ、三玖。
translation: H-hey, Miku.

japanese: なに？
translation: What?

japanese: 今日の夜、外を散歩しないか？
translation: Would you like to take a walk outside tonight?

japanese: ……夜に？
translation: ...At night?

japanese:
ホテルから国際通りが近いだろ？
他にも見るものがあるかもしれないし――
translation:
Kokusai dori is close from the hotel, right?
And there might be other things we'd like to see%p-2;――

japanese: ２人で……過ごすのはどうだ？
translation: How about spending some time...just the two of us?
The two of us...

japanese:
（夜に２人でって……
　フータロー、やっぱり……！）
translation:
(The two of us, at night...
 Futaro, is he perhaps thinking about...!)

japanese: ……ダメか？
translation: ...No good?

japanese: だ、ダメじゃ、ないんだけど……。
translation: I-it's not that I don't want to, but...

japanese:
あ、いや、もちろん嫌ならいいんだぞ？
無理はしなくていい！
translation:
Oh, well, I mean, if you don't want to,
that's fine. You don't have to push yourself!

japanese:
（２人で過ごしたいとは思う。
　でも、でも、フータローが
　本当にそういうことを考えてたら――）
translation:
(I do want to spend time with him, alone.
 But if Futaro is really thinking like that%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: わ、私――
きゃっ！
translation: Eeep!

japanese:
わっ！？
だ、大丈夫か三玖。
translation:
WOAH?!
A-are you okay, Miku?

japanese:
ご、ごめん。
足元見てなくて、つまづいちゃって。
translation:
S-sorry.
I wasn't looking where I was going and tripped.

japanese:
（さっきまで繋いでた手が熱い。
　……フータローの熱が移ったみたいに）
translation:
(My hand feels warm after holding his hand...
 like his warmth has transferred to me.)

japanese:
（手だけじゃない。顔も、熱い。
　きっとすごく赤くなってるし、
　変な顔になってる！！）
translation:
(It's not just his hand. My face also feels hot.
 It's probably really red... I must look super weird!!)

japanese: 三玖？
translation: Miku?

japanese:
は、早く行こう！
夕日、沈んじゃうから！
translation:
L-let's hurry!
The sun's going down!
Ah!

japanese: わっ！？
translation: WAH?!

japanese:
三玖？
なに、どうしたのよ。
translation:
Miku?
What, what's wrong?

japanese:
な、なんでもない。
急がないと日が沈んじゃうと思って。
translation:
It's n-nothing.
I just thought we should hurry before the sun sets.

japanese: え？　ちょっと待って！？
translation: Huh? Wait up?!

japanese: どうなってるの、これ。
translation: What's going on here?

japanese:
……フータロー君の様子を見るに、
また三玖が逃げ出したってことなんじゃない？
translation:
...Based on Futaro-kun's expression,
did Miku run away again?

japanese:
は？　さっきはうまくいってる感じだったのに？
どういうこと？
translation:
Huh? It seemed like things were going well earlier.
What happened?

japanese: わかんないけど……。
translation: I have no idea...

japanese: フータロー君が仕掛けたけど失敗しちゃった？
translation:
Maybe he tried to make a move,
but it didn't work out?

japanese:
三玖は……四葉たちのところで止まったわね。
とりあえず追いつきましょ。
translation:
Miku...stopped by where Yotsuba and the others are.
Let's catch up to her for now.

japanese: うん。
translation: Yes.
